content.rendered:
March 8 is International Women's Day.

 

Every year in Vietnam, it is a tradition for men to give women gifts and hold parties in their honor.

Rikkeisoft is no different.

 

This year, the men of Rikkeisoft pretended to be couriers. 

 

Since the Vietnamese internet economy is booming, the girls at our company receive packages and talk with couriers daily. So, using that to their advantage, our boys hoped to surprise the girls, add an element of excitement, and make the day more memorable than years past.

 

 

On the day of, the women of Rikkei received a phone call, telling them they've received an anonymous package. Wondering who their "Secret Admirer" was and what the contents were, our girls were very excited, knowing that it was Woman's Day. Whether at the office, on-site with a customer, or on maternity leave, the Rikkeisoft courier team reached every doorstep and made everyone's Women's Day one to remember.

 

Happy International Women's Day.

From Rikkeisoft.
